message.name: ERR_BANKBRANCH_DRE_SORTCODE
message.locale: The bank branch with sort code "%1s" already exists on the database.

message.name: ERR_BANKBRANCH_DRE_BIC
message.locale: The bank branch with BIC "%1s" already exists on the database.

message.name: ERR_BANKBRANCH_VALIDATION_FAILURE_LIST
message.locale: The following errors occurred when entering the bank branch: %1s

message.name: ERR_BANKBRANCH_XRV_AT_LEAST_ONE_OPEN_ACCOUNT
message.locale: You cannot close the bank branch "%1s" because it contains open accounts.

message.name: ERR_BANKBRANCH_XRV_CLOSED_BANK
message.locale: The branch cannot be inserted as the selected bank is closed.

message.name: ERR_BANKBRANCH_XFV_BANKBRANCH_SORTCODE_NOT_MATCH
message.locale: The branch and sort code supplied do not correspond.

message.name: ERR_BANKBRANCH_XFV_SPECIFY_SEARCH_CRITERIA
message.locale: You must specify some search criteria.

message.name: INF_BANKBRANCH_NO_MATCH_FOUND
message.locale: No records matched the criteria specified.
